title: What's with the 3 day timer on the orb?
body:
Does Riot seriously not want people to log into their game? 

Why play it when missions are done and you can't get an orb for 3 days? 

The RNG, terrible balancing, and lack of content due to Riot deleting content in the form of some units/traits. 

Like, why? At least with the daily orb I had a reason to log in everyday now I dont

replies.body:
Because a lot of people have lives and better things to do than log in daily just to click a button.

If you dont like the gamemode, why are you even playing it?

Free stuff?
Free stuff for the gamemode, yes...{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

They talked about why they did that. like someone else said, it was because not everyone can just long on every single day for their reward. having it every 3 days made it much easier for said people.
I assume it's because having to play 5 games a day was too much for people, so they made it every 3 days and tripled the gains.
